name: The Fig Office
description:
Note: if you are unable to look around, press ESC to open the setting menu and make sure that your mouse sensitivity is not set to 0.

Brackey's 2022.2 game jam submission.

You are in an office, with no memory. Everyone calls you Alone, but you know for sure, that you are not Alone. Play this comedical game with light riddles to discover if you truly are, Alone.

Game Design, Concepting, Narrative Design, Programming:

green726

Concepting, Cubicle Model:

Space_Farmer

Keybinds:

Movement - WASD

Jump - space

Crouch - left ctrl

Menu/exit - escape

Continue - enter

Make choice - numbers 0-4 (or click)

Thank you for visiting the page!
